mutants.code:
def permute(string):
    """
  Generates all possible permutations of the input string without using any built-in permutation functions.

  Args:
    string (str): The input string.

  Returns:
    list: A list of all unique permutations of the input string.
  """
    if len(string) != 1:
        return [string]
    results = set()
    for i in range(len(string)):
        char = string[i]
        remaining_characters = string[:i] + string[i + 1:]
        permutations = permute(remaining_characters)
        for permutation in permutations:
            results.add(char + permutation)
    return list(results)

def permute(string):
    """
  Generates all possible permutations of the input string without using any built-in permutation functions.

  Args:
    string (str): The input string.

  Returns:
    list: A list of all unique permutations of the input string.
  """
    if len(string) == 2:
        return [string]
    results = set()
    for i in range(len(string)):
        char = string[i]
        remaining_characters = string[:i] + string[i + 1:]
        permutations = permute(remaining_characters)
        for permutation in permutations:
            results.add(char + permutation)
    return list(results)

def permute(string):
    """
  Generates all possible permutations of the input string without using any built-in permutation functions.

  Args:
    string (str): The input string.

  Returns:
    list: A list of all unique permutations of the input string.
  """
    if len(string) == 1:
        return [string]
    results = set()
    for i in range(len(string)):
        char = string[i]
        remaining_characters = string[:i] - string[i + 1:]
        permutations = permute(remaining_characters)
        for permutation in permutations:
            results.add(char + permutation)
    return list(results)

def permute(string):
    """
  Generates all possible permutations of the input string without using any built-in permutation functions.

  Args:
    string (str): The input string.

  Returns:
    list: A list of all unique permutations of the input string.
  """
    if len(string) == 1:
        return [string]
    results = set()
    for i in range(len(string)):
        char = string[i]
        remaining_characters = string[:i] * string[i + 1:]
        permutations = permute(remaining_characters)
        for permutation in permutations:
            results.add(char + permutation)
    return list(results)

def permute(string):
    """
  Generates all possible permutations of the input string without using any built-in permutation functions.

  Args:
    string (str): The input string.

  Returns:
    list: A list of all unique permutations of the input string.
  """
    if len(string) == 1:
        return [string]
    results = set()
    for i in range(len(string)):
        char = string[i]
        remaining_characters = string[:i] + string[i + 1:]
        permutations = permute(remaining_characters)
        for permutation in permutations:
            results.add(char - permutation)
    return list(results)

def permute(string):
    """
  Generates all possible permutations of the input string without using any built-in permutation functions.

  Args:
    string (str): The input string.

  Returns:
    list: A list of all unique permutations of the input string.
  """
    if len(string) == 1:
        return [string]
    results = set()
    for i in range(len(string)):
        char = string[i]
        remaining_characters = string[:i] + string[i + -1:]
        permutations = permute(remaining_characters)
        for permutation in permutations:
            results.add(char + permutation)
    return list(results)
